pr_title: CB-6730. List instance groups even if all metadata are terminated.

timeline.bodyText: this name is more readable and meaningful: replaceInstanceMetadata or stuff like this

replies.bodyText: I have followed the same pattern as its used for other entities (like the instanceGroups in Stack object), but that can be done of course
replies.author: oleewere
